definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I took a picture so you can see the label.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了張像片所以你們能夠看到這個標籤。

sentences.english: The first peak that we climbed is the "Nazogl", which is the peak slightly left off the middle of this picture.
sentences.chinese: 像片中間稍微偏左的第一個山頂就是納佐格山頂。

sentences.english: We have not married Qiana , you are not only read my photograph.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒有結婚的錢啊，你不也是隻看過我的像片。

sentences.english: Unfortunately the photo is a bit dark, so cannot see the reception clearly.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸像片拍得有些暗，所以看不清前臺。

sentences.english: It looks exactly like the spinning astrolabe from the opening credits.
sentences.chinese: 這看起來分明就像片頭裏旋轉的星盤。

sentences.english: Before we sent her to the Baby Lino , we took some pictures with her.
sentences.chinese: 在去活動室之前，我們和寶寶一起拍了些像片。

sentences.english: These pictures were taken from the first viewpoint we reached this day.
sentences.chinese: 這些像片是我們到達第一個觀景點時侯拍的。

sentences.english: In the evening, we got our baby back, and took some pictures with her again.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，我們把寶寶接回來，和她又拍了些像片。

sentences.english: This clip of surveillance-camera footage is very much worth avoiding.
sentences.chinese: 監控錄像片段顯示的事故真的不應該發生。

sentences.english: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.chinese: 幾部讓人翹首企盼的錄像片終於將在這個月到貨。

sentences.english: There will be no one like Slice ever again in Sweden as I see it.
sentences.chinese: 將不會有一個像片再次在瑞典，我看到它。

sentences.english: A few more pics of the Blaa Alm.
Although I felt disappointed for the Königsee, I still took some pictures there.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我對國王湖感到失望，但還是拍了不少像片。

sentences.english: The clips became the most widely-viewed videos in South Korea for several hours before they were deleted.
sentences.chinese: 這些片段被刪除前已經成爲觀看人數最多的錄像片段。

sentences.english: The NYPD released video footage Sunday to back up its stance.
sentences.chinese: 週日，紐約警察局公佈錄像片段來表明立場。

sentences.english: We need a copy of your passport and one photo.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要你的護照複印件和一張像片。

definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
(of a light source) to cast one's light on/to project (an image)
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
